channel.title: attack.t1531 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1531 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Remove Account From Domain Admin Group
item.description: Adversaries may interrupt availability of system and network resources by inhibiting access to accounts utilized by legitimate users. Accounts may be deleted, locked, or manipulated (ex: changed credentials) to remove access to accounts.

item.title: Google Cloud Service Account Disabled or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a service account is disabled or deleted in Google Cloud.

item.title: AWS ElastiCache Security Group Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when an ElastiCache security group has been modified or deleted.
